detaileddescription.para: Number of records in example database

briefdescription.para: Get the next database record after the given current record.

simplesect.para: Pointer to record or NULL if no record.

briefdescription.para: Get the next database record after the given current record.

simplesect.para: Pointer to record or NULL if no record.

briefdescription.para: Get the next record filtered for "all".

parameterdescription.para: Return pointer to next record, if found.

simplesect.para: CH_RACP_RSP_SUCCESS if a record is found, otherwise an error status is returned.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the pulse oximeter record database.
Get the next record that matches the given filter parameters that follows the given current record.

parameterdescription.para: Return pointer to next record, if found.

simplesect.para: CH_RACP_RSP_SUCCESS if a record is found, otherwise an error status is returned.

briefdescription.para: Delete records that match the given filter parameters.

simplesect.para: CH_RACP_RSP_SUCCESS if records deleted, otherwise an error status is returned.

briefdescription.para: Get the number of records matching the filter parameters.

parameterdescription.para: Returns number of records which match filter parameters.

briefdescription.para: Pulse Oximeter profile example record database and access functions.
